data.title: Raaj Kamal Films International
authors: Contributors to JH Movie Collection Wiki
data.meta_description: Raaj Kamal Films International is an Indian film production and distribution company founded and headed by Kamal Haasan. Raja Paarvai (1981) was the first film to be produced by them under the banner "Haazan Brothers" before renaming it to Raaj Kamal Films International. In addition to the films...
data.text: Title Year Language Director Cast Synopsis Ref. Raja Paarvai 1981 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Madhavi, Y. G. Mahendra, L. V. Prasad Amavasya Chandrudu 1981 Telugu Kamal Haasan, Madhavi, Y. G. Mahendra, L. V. Prasad Vikram 1986 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Sathyaraj, Amjad Khan, Dimple Kapadia, Ambika, Lissy Agent Vikram fights a lone battle to recapture the nuclear-capable Ballistic missile from a dangerous criminal, who plans to destroy India's capital New Delhi. Kadamai Kanniyam Kattupaadu 1987 Tamil Sathyaraj, Geetha, Jeevitha, Nassar, Captain Raju An honest and straightforward Tamil Nadu police officer spends his life tackling crime. Sathya 1988 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Amala, Rajesh, Nassar A young man, frustrated with unemployment in India, ends up becoming a henchman and works up to become a political leader, who has his own agenda. Apoorva Sagodharargal 1989 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Gautami, Rupini, Srividya Two twins, one circus midget and one mechanic, discover that their father was an honest police officer who was killed by four criminals, and plot to take revenge. Thevar Magan 1992 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Sivaji Ganesan, Revathi, Gautami, Nassar A youngster, who studied in London, is suddenly forced to take up the role of village chieftain role after the death of his father. Magalir Mattum 1994 Tamil Revathi, Urvashi, Rohini, Nassar Three working women come together to stop the lecherous ways of their boss. Sathi Leelavathi 1995 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Ramesh Arvind, Heera, Kalpana, Kovai Sarala Arun, a married man, has an affair with Priya as he dislikes his wife Leelavathi, who is plain-looking and overweight. When she discovers Arun's affair, she plots with Dr Sakthivel to win Arun back. Kuruthipunal 1995 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Arjun, Nassar, Gautami, Geetha A police officer with familial obligations battles to curb terrorism in the country. Drohi 1995 Telugu Kamal Haasan, Arjun, Nassar, Gautami, Geetha Chachi 420 1997 Hindi Kamal Haasan, Tabu, Amrish Puri, Om Puri A man dresses up a nanny to spend more time with his estranged daughter. [1] Hey Ram 2000 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Shah Rukh Khan, Rani Mukerji, Hema Malini, Atul Kulkarni Saket Ram joins a movement to kill Mahatma Gandhi for apparent treachery against Hindu-dominated India. [2] Hey Ram 2000 Hindi Kamal Haasan, Shah Rukh Khan, Rani Mukerji, Hema Malini, Atul Kulkarni [3] Nala Damayanthi 2003 Tamil Madhavan, Geetu Mohandas, Shruthika A naive Indian cook finds himself having to marry a native of Australia to stay in the country. [4] Virumaandi 2004 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Abhirami, Napoleon, Pasupathy Two prisoners explain the same incident from their different point of view to a reporter. [5] Mumbai Xpress 2005 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Manisha Koirala, Nassar A deaf bike rider is forced to kidnap the son of a financier but ends up kidnapping the wrong child. [6] Mumbai Xpress 2005 Hindi Kamal Haasan, Manisha Koirala, Om Puri [7] Eenadu 2009 Telugu Kamal Haasan, Venkatesh, Ganesh Venkatraman, Bharath Reddy An anonymous caller informs a police commissioner about the bombs he has planted in the city. [8] Unnaipol Oruvan 2009 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Mohanlal, Ganesh Venkatraman, Bharath Reddy [9] Vishwaroopam 2013 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Rahul Bose, Pooja Kumar, Andrea Jeremiah A secret RAW agent poses as an effeminate dancer to unearth the secrets of terrorists. [10] Vishwaroop 2013 Hindi Kamal Haasan, Rahul Bose, Pooja Kumar, Andrea Jeremiah [11] Uttama Villain 2015 Tamil Kamal Haasan, K. Balachander, K. Viswanath, Andrea Jeremiah, Pooja Kumar A famous actor, who has been diagnosed with brain cancer, decides to act in a fantasy-comedy film directed by his mentor for his last film. [12] Thoongaa Vanam 2015 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Prakash Raj, Trisha, Kishore A police officer finds himself having to save his kidnapped son and bust a drug cartel in the course of a single night. [13] Cheekati Rajyam 2015 Telugu Kamal Haasan, Prakash Raj, Trisha, Kishore [14] Vishwaroopam II 2018 Tamil Kamal Haasan, Rahul Bose, Pooja Kumar, Andrea Jeremiah A former Indian army officer is sent undercover to infiltrate a terrorist group and help rescue hostages. [15] Vishwaroop II 2018 Hindi Kamal Haasan, Rahul Bose, Pooja Kumar, Andrea Jeremiah [16] Kadaram Kondan 2019 Tamil Vikram, Akshara Haasan, Abi Hassan A young doctor is forced to team up with a criminal after his wife is kidnapped in Kuala Lumpur. [17]
